job_description:
Who We Are

Founded in 2002, Zafin offers a SaaS product and pricing platform that simplifies core modernization for top banks worldwide. Our platform enables business users to work collaboratively to design and manage pricing, products, and packages, while technologists streamline core banking systems.

With Zafin, banks accelerate time to market for new products and offers while lowering the cost of change and achieving tangible business and risk outcomes. The Zafin platform increases business agility while enabling personalized pricing and dynamic responses to evolving customer and market needs.

Zafin is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, with offices and customers around the globe including ING, CIBC, HSBC, Wells Fargo, PNC, and ANZ. Zafin is proud to be recognized as a top employer and certified Great Place to Work® in Canada, India and the UK.

What is the Opportunity?

We're building a next-generation analytics capability to help banks compose and launch differentiated propositions. Reporting to the SVP Analytics, the Senior Software Engineer, Analytics will be responsible for defining, designing, and building the product. This position will collaborate with the platform architecture team for the definition and adoption of the appropriate design patterns.

Mode of work: Hybrid

What will you do?

Design and build the API and cloud services for the analytics product
Understand the product vision and contribute to the product roadmap, especially for non-functional requirements
Develop solution design in collaboration with the architecture team, with a focus on non-functional requirements such as performance and security
Champion clean architecture and best practices for security, reliability, performance efficiency and cost optimization
Work with architects and engineers across Zafin to design an interoperable product
Leverage the Zafin platform stack, and where required, build new services from the ground up
Perform code reviews and make recommendations to refactor where required so the code is maintainable and 'clean'
Provide technical guidance and leadership to engineers on the product team
Collaborate with peers in Cloud Operations to design for reliability and maintainability

What do you need to succeed?

Must have:

4+ years of software engineering, preferably with data-intensive applications
Proficiency in modern object-oriented programming and domain-driven design
Experience with Java, and application development frameworks (such as Spring Boot for Java)
Schema and database design expertise for data-intensive applications
Ability to empathize with the end-user and think from their perspective to build user experiences that delight
Experience with building products that follow cloud-native architecture principles (including cloud infrastructure, automation, and security design)
Experience practicing and prioritizing clean architecture
Strong understanding of event-driven architectures

Nice to Have:

Priority will be given to candidates with streaming technologies experience such as Kafka, and Flink

What's In It For You

Joining our team means being part of a culture that values diversity, teamwork, and high-quality work. We offer competitive salaries, annual bonus potential, generous paid time off, paid volunteering days, wellness benefits, and robust opportunities for professional growth and career advancement. Want to learn more about what you can look forward to during your career with us? Visit our careers site and our openings: zafin.com/careers

Zafin welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

Zafin is committed to protecting the privacy and security of the personal information collected from all applicants throughout the recruitment process. The methods by which Zafin contains uses, stores, handles, retains, or discloses applicant information can be accessed by reviewing Zafin's privacy policy at https://zafin.com/privacy-notice/. By submitting a job application, you confirm that you agree to the processing of your personal data by Zafin described in the privacy notice.
